How to write ANTLR grammar:
---------------------------

* Writing Verilog grammar for the output of VIS, the counter example

	? : either zero or one
	+ : One or more
	* : Zero or more

	Wildcard characters: 
		'.' : All characters
		~c : every character but c

20/04/2016:
-----------
